# decodeTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The decode timestamp of the sample at the current position of the cursor.

## Declaration

```swift
var decodeTimeStamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Getting timestamps

- **presentationTimeStamp**: The presentation timestamp of the sample at the current position of the cursor.
